summary: An upper-crust artist hires a 'party girl' as a model; romance follows.
cast: Barbara Stanwyck|Ralph Graves|Lowell Sherman|Marie Prevost|Nance O'Neil|George Fawcett|Juliette Compton|Johnnie Walker|Willie Best|Charles Butterworth|Jay Eaton|Edith Ellison|Harry Strang
keywords: party girl|remade|bigotry|snobbery|wrong side of the tracks girl
director: Director: Frank Capra (as Frank R. Capra)
title: Mujeres ligeras
